about_the_game:
Welcome to Elemental Land: A Casual and Cross-Platform MMORPG!


Prepare to dive into a fantastic world filled with exciting adventures, magical creatures, and hidden treasures. "Elemental Land" is a casual MMORPG that unites PC and mobile players in a single immersive experience.

Key Features:

🌟 Cross-Platform Gameplay:

Play with your friends, whether they are on PC or mobile. The adventure never stops!

🗺️ Open World:

Explore vast territories with diverse biomes, from enchanted forests to mysterious deserts and snowy mountains. Every corner of the world holds unique secrets and challenges.

⚔️ Exciting Battles:

Face epic monsters and challenging bosses with an intuitive combat system. Customize your skills and equipment to become the most powerful hero.

🛠️ Character Customization:

Create your unique hero with various appearance options, classes, and skills. Evolve and discover new ways to play with each level you gain.

🤝 Vibrant Community:

Join guilds, participate in real-time events, and make new friends in a welcoming community. Collaborate on group missions and achieve glory together.

🎉 Regular Events:

Enjoy seasonal events, daily challenges, and exclusive rewards. There is always something new to discover in "Elemental Land."

💡 Easy Access:

Designed for casual play, "Elemental Land" is perfect for both quick sessions and gaming marathons. Access your account from any device and continue your journey where you left off.

Join "Elemental Land" now and become part of an ever-evolving legend. Fantasy awaits you!

The game will be free.

How will the game servers be maintained if it's free?
Through the sale of cosmetics and mounts in the cash shop.

Will there be any items that give players an advantage in the cash shop?
No, there will be no items that give players an advantage. Only cosmetics and some services will be sold.

Will the game be released on other platforms?
Initially, the game will be released for PC and Android, then it will be made available on other platforms.

name: Elemental Land

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Elemental Land is a casual cross-platform MMORPG for PC and mobile. Explore a vast open world, customize your hero, battle epic monsters, and join a vibrant community. Play anytime, anywhere, and discover new challenges and rewards in regular events.
